title: CLAUDE.md
text: codecheck package R package assists conducting CODECHECKs - independent verification computational research. provides two main functions: Workspace creation tools - Help researchers prepare CODECHECK workspaces proper metadata structure Register management tools - Render maintain CODECHECK Register tracks completed codechecks

text: Install package: Run tests using tinytest: package uses GitHub Actions CI/CD. Check .github/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml automated testing setup.

title: CLAUDE.md
text: Main entry point: create_codecheck_files() creates initial CODECHECK workspace including: codecheck.yml file required metadata (certificate ID, authors, manifest, etc.) codecheck/ directory report templates Key functions: codecheck_metadata() - Load parse codecheck.yml copy_manifest_files() - Copy output files specified manifest codecheck folder validate_codecheck_yml() - Validate codecheck.yml file meets specification (R/configuration.R:196) Zenodo integration: Functions uploading certificates Zenodo: get_or_create_zenodo_record() - Create retrieve Zenodo record upload_zenodo_metadata() - Upload metadata codecheck.yml set_zenodo_certificate() - Upload PDF certificate

title: CLAUDE.md
text: Main entry point: register_render() processes CSV register file generates multiple views: HTML pages certificate Markdown summaries JSON data files Filtered views venue, codechecker, etc. Architecture flow: Load register CSV config files (inst/extdata/config.R contains global CONFIG) preprocess_register() enriches entries remote codecheck.yml data (R/utils_preprocess_register.R) render_cert_htmls() - HTML certificate pages (R/utils_render_cert_htmls.R) create_filtered_reg_csvs() - CSV files filtered venue/codechecker (R/utils_create_filtered_register_csvs.R) create_register_files() - Main register tables (R/utils_render_register_mds.R, R/utils_render_register_htmls.R, R/utils_render_register_json.R) create_non_register_files() - Lists venues/codecheckers (R/utils_render_table_*.R) Configuration: inst/extdata/config.R defines global CONFIG environment : Table column widths structures URL patterns different platforms (GitHub, OSF, GitLab, Zenodo) Hyperlink templates Venue codechecker display settings

title: CLAUDE.md
text: Main entry point: get_codecheck_yml() fetches codecheck.yml remote repositories. Multi-platform support via parse_repository_spec(): github::org/repo - GitHub repositories osf::ABC12 - OSF projects (5-character IDs) gitlab::project/repo - GitLab.com projects zenodo::1234567 - Zenodo records (7+ digit IDs) zenodo-sandbox::1234567 - Zenodo Sandbox platform dedicated retrieval functions (get_codecheck_yml_github(), etc.) results cached using R.cache::addMemoization().

title: CLAUDE.md
text: YAML configuration file must contain: certificate - Pattern: NNNN-NNN (e.g., “2024-001”) paper - Title, authors (name optional ORCID), reference URL codechecker - Name optional ORCID checker(s) manifest - List output files, file comment report - DOI Zenodo certificate repository - URL(s) code repository check_time - ISO 8601 timestamp See template inst/extdata/templates/codecheck.yml.

title: CLAUDE.md
text: register CSV contains columns: Certificate - ID (e.g., “2024-001”) Repository - Platform-prefixed spec (e.g., “github::codecheckers/repo”) Type - Venue category (journal, conference, community, institution) Venue - Short venue name Issue - GitHub issue number CODECHECK Report - Zenodo DOI Check date - ISO 8601 date

title: CLAUDE.md
text: Templates use Pandoc Markdown rendering whisker package rendering specific parts HTMLs using Mustache’s logicless templating. Templates located inst/extdata/templates/: cert/ - Certificate markdown HTML templates reg_tables/ - Register table templates non_reg_tables/ - Venue/codechecker list templates general/ - Shared HTML headers/footers

title: CLAUDE.md
text: GitHub API token: Set GITHUB_PAT environment variable avoid rate limits rendering register Caching: Remote configurations cached via R.cache. Use register_clear_cache() reset ORCID format: Must without URL prefix (NNNN-NNNN-NNNN-NNNX format) DOI validation: Uses rorcid::check_dois() requires network access UTF-8 encoding: YAML files UTF-8 encoded Date formats: Use ISO 8601 date/time fields Manifest files: Paths manifest relative root repository Zenodo sandbox: Use zenodo-sandbox:: prefix testing uploads without affecting main Zenodo repository Configuration updates: Update inst/extdata/config.R changes URL patterns, table structures, etc. Testing: Use tinytest unit tests located inst/extdata/tests/ Documentation: Use roxygen2 function documentation
